attributes.action: Abolish Road tax and increase duty on fuel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A lot of people do not tax vehs however they have to buy fuel. Therefore if we abolish car tax but increase fuel duty everybody will pay a fair share. The more miles you drive the more you pay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
